Is your computer running slower than usual? Dust buildup on your motherboard could be the culprit! It’s surprisingly easy for dust to impact performance and even cause overheating.

Want to breathe new life into your computer? Learn how to clean your motherboard with our simple guide: https://www.beacleaner.com/how-to-clean-a-motherboard
